title: The.Wind.In.The.Willows.Season.1.DVDRip.AC3.XviD-TAR
description:
Summary:

With amazingly detailed sets that recreate Mole End, Toad Hall, and the Wild Wood, these episodes capture the spellbinding stop-motion genius of Cosgrove Hall Productions. Toad, Mole, Rat, and Badger do their best to maintain the simple pleasures of life, even as the pesky weasels lurk nearby. Filled with music and song - and plenty of tea and jam - our gentlemanly quartet always find a way to traverse life&#039;s ups and downs with aplomb. This production from the makers of Dangermouse and Count Duckula is widely considered the best and most faithful adaption of Kenneth Grahame&#039;s classic book.

Cast:

Richard Pearson ... Mole (voice)
Peter Sallis ... Rat (voice)
David Jason ... Toad (voice)
Michael Hordern ... Badger (voice)

Details:

Runtime: 20 min each / ~260 min total
Source: DVD

Audio: AC3 @ 224 kbps / 2 channel stereo
Resolution: 640 x 480
